hero.description: A powerful, interactive, and customizable visual component collection for React applications. Create stunning image experiences with hover effects, animations, and modern interactions.

features.title: Powerful Image Components
features.subtitle: Choose from our collection of interactive React components designed to enhance your user experience.

clickExpand.title: Click to Expand
clickExpand.description: Interactive expandable images that grow beautifully on click with smooth animations.

hoverSwitch.title: Hover Switch
hoverSwitch.description: Dynamic image switching on hover with customizable transition effects and timing.

tiltOnHover.title: 3D Tilt Effect
tiltOnHover.description: Modern 3D tilt animations that respond to mouse movement for depth and engagement.

zoomOnHover.title: Zoom on Hover
zoomOnHover.description: Smooth zoom effects that highlight details and create focus on important visuals.

depthFocus.title: Depth Focus
depthFocus.description: Cinematic focus shifts with layered blur, glow accents, and parallax tilt.

splitLayers.title: Split Layers
splitLayers.description: Multi-layer parallax and peel effects with ripple reveals and glass overlays.

examples.title: See It in Action
examples.subtitle: Explore interactive demos of our components and see how they can enhance your applications.

contributors.title: Join Our Community
contributors.subtitle: Help us make React image components better for everyone.

cta.title: Support Our Work
cta.subtitle: Help us continue building amazing React components for the community.

coffee.title: Buy Me a Coffee
coffee.description: Support the development and maintenance of this project with a small donation.

github.title: Star on GitHub
github.description: Give us a star on GitHub to show your support and help others discover this project.

cta.reportIssueDescription: Found a bug or have a suggestion? A pull request is welcome. Let us know!
cta.shareDescription: Share this project with your friends. All help is appreciated! We love to see it spread around.

showcase.title: Interactive Showcase
showcase.subtitle: Experience the power of our React image components with live demonstrations and interactive examples.
showcase.clickExpand: Click to expand and view in full screen
showcase.depthFocus: Layered blur focus shift with glow and parallax tilt
showcase.splitLayers: Multi-layer parallax/peel with ripple reveal and glass sheen

explore.title: Explore Interactive Demos
explore.description: See how our components work in real applications with fully interactive examples and comprehensive documentation.
